name: Logic
description: Performs logical operations (AND, OR, XOR, NAND, NOR, XNOR, SR flip-flop, D flip-flop) on pairs of inputs. Each channel operates independently with configurable input thresholds and hysteresis.

specifications.name: Channels
specifications.description: The number of channels to process.

parameters.name: Threshold
parameters.description: Sets the input threshold. Signals above this voltage are treated as a logic '1'/true.

parameters.name: Hysteresis
parameters.description: Sets the input hysteresis. Once over the threshold, signals must fall by this amount before being treated as a logic '0'/false.

parameters.name: Output true
parameters.description: The output voltage for logic '1'/true. Logic '0'/false is always output as 0V.

parameters.name: Operation
parameters.description: Selects the logical operation from the table above.

parameters.name: Input X
parameters.description: Chooses the X input bus for the operation.

parameters.name: Input Y
parameters.description: Chooses the Y input bus for the operation.

parameters.name: Output mode
parameters.description: The standard Add/Replace mode selector as described above.
